text: James Erskine may refer to: *James Erskine, 6th Earl of Buchan (died 1640) *James Erskine, 7th Earl of Buchan (died 1664), Earl of Buchan *Sir James Erskine, 2nd Baronet (c. 1670–1693), of the Erskine baronets *James Erskine (Aberdeen MP) (born 1671), Scottish soldier and politician *James Erskine, Lord Grange (1679–1754), Scottish judge and Jacobite *James Erskine, Lord Alva (c. 1720–1796), Scottish judge, Knight Marischal *James St Clair-Erskine, 2nd Earl of Rosslyn (1762–1837), Scottish soldier and politician *Sir James Erskine, 3rd Baronet (1772–1825), of the Erskine baronets *Sir James Erskine (Royal Navy officer) (1838–1911), Admiral of the Fleet *James Erskine, Earl of Mar and Kellie (born 1949), Scottish Liberal Democrat member of the House of Lords *James Malcolm Monteith Erskine (1863–1944), British Member of Parliament for Westminster St George's, 1921–1929 *James Erskine (director), see The Human Face
title: James Erskine
